Data Deletion Request - PeachPapaya

Last Updated: August 1, 2025

Your Right to Data Deletion

Under data protection laws, you have the right to request deletion of your personal information from our systems. We will process your request within 30 days.

What Data We Store

We may store the following information about you:

  • Name and contact information
  • Phone number and WhatsApp messages
  • Email address
  • Payment information
  • Lesson history and scheduling data
  • Driver's license information
  • Emergency contact details

How to Request Data Deletion

Option 1: Email Request

Send an email to: sreerag@welovedinspace.studio

Subject line: "Data Deletion Request"

Include in your email:

  • Your full name
  • Phone number associated with your account
  • Email address used for registration
  • Reason for deletion (optional)

Option 2: WhatsApp Request

If you have our WhatsApp number, you can send a message with:

  • Your name
  • Request for data deletion
  • Confirmation of your identity

What Happens After Your Request

  1. Verification: We will verify your identity
  2. Processing: Your data will be deleted within 30 days
  3. Confirmation: You will receive confirmation of deletion
  4. Backup Removal: Data will be removed from all systems

Important Notes:

  • Deletion is permanent and cannot be undone
  • You will lose access to your lesson history
  • Any unused lesson credits will be forfeited
  • We may retain certain records for legal compliance

Data Retention Exceptions

Some data may be retained for legal or regulatory purposes:

  • Financial records for tax purposes
  • Safety incident reports
  • Insurance claim records
  • Regulatory compliance data

Contact Information

Email: sreerag@welovedinspace.studio

Response Time: Within 48 hours

Processing Time: Up to 30 days

Alternative: Data Access

If you want to see what data we have about you before deletion, you can request a copy of your data using the same contact methods.

Development version - Updated policies will be published before production launch.
